sentences.en: A school technician pirated anything from video nasties to computer games.
sentences.cn: 学校的一名技术人员做盗版，从黄色录像到计算机游戏什么都有。

sentences.en: A technician loads a video tape into one of the machines.
sentences.cn: 一名技师把一盒录影带装进其中一台机器。

sentences.en: And lab technician are not in demand at other company.
sentences.cn: 其他公司也不需要实验师.

sentences.en: For some young writers she was a person to believe in, if only as a technician.
sentences.cn: 有些青年作家认为她是值得信赖的,至少在写作技巧方面.

sentences.en: He is a versatile, veteran and superb technician.
sentences.cn: 他是个技术全面、经验丰富、技巧娴熟的运动能手

sentences.en: He is an electrical technician by profession.
He works as a sound technician in a recording studio.
sentences.cn: 他在录音室做音效技师.

sentences.en: Instrumentation Technician: Valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Instrumentation Technician certification is required.
sentences.cn: 仪表技术员: 有效艾伯塔省或跨省熟练工仪表技术员证书是必需的.

sentences.en: It is an intriguing problem for the snow technician.
sentences.cn: 这对冰雪工程人员来说是个百思不得其解的问题.

sentences.en: Mary is training to be a technician.
sentences.cn: 玛丽正在接受培训,准备成为一名技术员.

sentences.en: The film was edited by a skilled technician so that the joints are imperceptible.
sentences.cn: 这部影片是由一位技术熟练的技术人员剪辑的,因此连接处难以觉察.

sentences.en: The technician had on an antiseptic white jacket.
sentences.cn: 那个技术员穿着消毒白色夹克.

sentences.en: The technician is busy repairing the machine.
sentences.cn: 技师正忙于修理那台机器.

sentences.en: There was a touch of pride in the technician's question.
sentences.cn: 技术师的问话中有一丝骄傲的味道.

sentences.en: Train plant technician to assure successful start up of assigned projects.
sentences.cn: 培训工厂技术员以确保指定项目的成功启动.

技术上；专门地；学术上；工艺上

专家管理；专家政治论，技术统治论
技术统治论者；专家政治论者；技术统治

phrases.tran_cn: 实验室技术员；实验技师

trans.tran_cn: 技术人员，技师，技巧纯熟的人
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to check equipment or machines and make sure that they are working properly
